title: From come burgers to come boxes
content:encoded:
With Celebrity Treasure Island starting next week, it's time for a good old chaos pod. Why is The Hoff everywhere? Why is Mike Puru leaving? And what does a post "come box" New Zealand look like?

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
